name: Geocaching.com Clean Up Print Page
description:
Removes several paragraphs from print page so save paper: Disclaimer, short description, heading of long description, attribute symbols, trackable items and the Google Maps map.

There are comments in the code, so feel free to modify the print page the way you want it!

Updated on 09.10.10 due to geocaching.com site changes on 05.10.10.
